titleStmt.title: An impartial account of Richard Duke of York's treasons, and the several arts and methods made use of by him for the obtaining the crown of England to which is added The true picture of a popish successor, exactly drawn by the reigns of Christian the Second, and Sygismond, King of Sweden, and Ferdinand the Second, King of Bohemia.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
